actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide hospital and domiciliary care and medical treatment in Veterans' Administration facilities to former prisoners of war who are not veterans.

summary.text: Authorizes the Veterans' Administration to provide hospital and domiciliary care and medical treatment in Veterans' Administration facilities to former prisoners of war who are not veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide hospital and domiciliary care and medical treatment in Veterans' Administration facilities to former prisoners of war who are not veterans.
